thread.title: Alt-Right leader Richard Spencer sucker-punched in the face during the inauguration protests
thread.title_full: Alt-Right leader Richard Spencer sucker-punched in the face during the inauguration protests

author: Greg P.
title: Alt-Right leader Richard Spencer sucker-punched in the face during the inauguration protests
text:
Full clip here via ABC News in Australia . 
The punch happens at the :32 mark as Spencer explained his Pepe the Frog pin to the reporter. You then see the cowardly assailant quickly flee the scene: Trending 
Spencer later tweeted, ‚ÄúNo serious damage‚Äù and ‚ÄúI can take a punch‚Äù: I was just physically assaulted twice by antifas. No serious damage. I can take a punch. 
‚Äî Richard üê∏ Spencer (@RichardBSpencer) January 20, 2017
